title: Service disruption on Bukit Panjang LRT

updates.text: [BPLRT] UPDATE: Train service is still available between #BukitPanjang and #Senja via Service B. We are sorry for affecting your evening commute. Stay tune for further updates.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Shuttle Train service between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang will end at 10.00pm. Free regular bus services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang are available.

[BPLRT] UPDATE: Due to a Train fault, normal train service is affected. Shuttle train service is available between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang. Train service between #BukitPanjang and #Petir via Service A and #Senja via Service B is not affected.
